keyPolicies.policyDescription: A fair deal for families with a Council Tax freeze until 2016.
Faster and better treatment with a guarantee to protect the NHS budget.
Giving young Scots a fair chance at a job with a record 25,000 apprenticeship places.
Work to make communities safer by keeping the 1,000 extra police on the beat.
Giving young Scots a fair start in life with 60,000 fewer pupils taught in crumbling schools and university education kept free.
A future that is greener as well as fairer, with 130,000 jobs in the green economy by 2020.

issues.education: 60,000 fewer pupils taught in crumbling schools and university education kept free.
issues.environment: 130,000 jobs in the green economy by 2020.
issues.health: Guarantee to protect the NHS budget.

images.caption: We're working for a fairer Scotland.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the message of working towards a fairer Scotland and highlights the key policies aimed at achieving this goal. It also includes a reminder that voters have two votes on May 5th, encouraging them to support the SNP with both votes.
